scripts.build_css_base_base: while true; do npx sass Morningstar/static/base/css/base.scss Morningstar/static/base/css/base.css --no-source-map --style compressed && echo '✔︎ build base/base.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.build_css_base: npx concurrently 'npm run build_css_base_tailwind' 'npm run build_css_base_base'
scripts.build_css_blog_base: while true; do npx sass apps/blog/static/blog/css/base.scss apps/blog/static/blog/css/base.css --no-source-map --style compressed && echo '✔︎ build blog/base.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.build_css_blog: npx concurrently 'npm run build_css_blog_tailwind' 'npm run build_css_blog_base'
scripts.build_css_lover_style: while true; do npx sass apps/lover/static/lover/css/style.scss apps/lover/static/lover/css/style.css --no-source-map --style compressed && echo '✔︎ build lover/style.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.build_css_lover: npx concurrently 'npm run build_css_lover_tailwind' 'npm run build_css_lover_style'
scripts.build_css_nav_style: while true; do npx sass apps/nav/static/nav/css/style.scss apps/nav/static/nav/css/style.css --no-source-map --style compressed && echo '✔︎ build nav/style.css'; sleep 5; done;
scripts.build_css_nav: npx concurrently 'npm run build_css_nav_tailwind' 'npm run build_css_nav_style'
scripts.build_css: npx concurrently "npm run build_css_base" "npm run build_css_blog" "npm run build_css_lover" "npm run build_css_nav" "npm run build_css_rss"
scripts.build: npx concurrently "npm run build_css" "npm run build_js"
